overview.goal: EasyTax is a taxtech platform designed to make tax compliance simple, inclusive, and accessible to every Nigerian. It allows users to learn about taxes, calculate what they owe, and pay directly to official tax agencies — all in one place.
overview.problem_statement: Many Nigerians find tax processes confusing, with scattered information, manual filing, and complex payment procedures that discourage compliance.
overview.solution: EasyTax centralizes tax education, computation, and payments into one intuitive web platform. It supports both English and Pidgin, uses icons and audio to simplify learning, and lets users calculate, pay, and track taxes seamlessly.
overview.target_users: Individual taxpayers, freelancers, and small business owners (SMEs) across Nigeria seeking a simpler way to understand, calculate, and pay their taxes.
goals: Simplify tax learning for everyday Nigerians.
Help users calculate federal and state taxes easily.
Allow users to pay securely to government accounts.
Provide a dashboard for tax tracking and reminders.
Support multilingual and accessible usage for low-literate users.

tax_education_portal.description: Educates users on tax concepts in simple English and Pidgin using visuals and audio aids.
features: Explains major Nigerian tax types (Personal Income Tax, PAYE, Company Income Tax).
Pidgin and English versions available.
Uses infographics, short videos, and voice narration.
FAQ section for common tax questions.

interactive_tax_calculator.description: Step-by-step calculator that helps users determine applicable taxes.
features: Inputs: income, occupation, and business type.
Automatically computes estimated tax liability using official brackets.
Supports federal (FIRS) and state (e.g., LIRS) taxes.
Guest users can access this feature freely.

tax_payment_integration.description: Allows users to pay taxes directly to official government accounts.
features: Integrates with Paystack or Flutterwave for secure transactions.
Automatically routes funds to official government accounts.
Applies a ₦600 service commission per transaction.
Generates instant digital receipts with SMS and email confirmation.

user_dashboard.description: Dashboard for subscribed users to manage their tax profile and payments.
features: Shows payment history and receipts.
Tracks upcoming deadlines and reminders.
Provides downloadable reports.
Offers voice guidance (English and Pidgin).
Subscription-based access for advanced features (₦ yearly).

multi_language_accessibility.description: Ensures inclusivity for all Nigerians regardless of literacy level.
features: Supports English and Pidgin interface.
Includes text-to-speech and audio explanations.
Uses large icons and minimal text.
Auto-detects user device language or location.

admin_dashboard.description: Enables admins to manage content, analytics, and tax rules.
features: View total users, transactions, and feedback.
Add or edit educational content (text, video, audio).
Update tax rates and rules.
Access analytics dashboard for performance insights.

subscription_model.description: Users can subscribe yearly to unlock premium features like voice guidance, automatic filing, and full dashboard access.
benefits: Access to tax reminders and records.
